Features maintained outside UI Grid Repository

This is a list of features maintained by third parties. If you have developed a feature for UI Grid that you'd like listed, please create a Pull Request with this page (located in the misc/tutorial folder) updated.

ui-grid-draggable-rows

Draggable rows in UI Grid.
https://github.com/cdwv/ui-grid-draggable-rows

ui-grid-odata

Allows querying for odata v3/v4 services
https://github.com/mirik123/ui-grid-odata
